text: Taavi Vartiainen (born June 30, 1994) is a Finnish ice hockey player. He is currently playing with Ilves in the Finnish Liiga. Vartiainen made his Liiga debut playing with Lahti Pelicans during the 2014–15 Liiga season.http://www.pelicans.fi/video/pelaajahaastattelu-taavi-vartiainen ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish ice hockey forwards Category:Lahti Pelicans players
title: Taavi Vartiainen
